title: Camel EndpointRouteBuilder throws org.objectweb.asm.MethodTooLargeException
body:
### Describe the bug

A class that implements a Camel EndpointRouteBuilder with six methods additional methods (besides configure) throws an exception when starting quarkus.
Note that if the builder has less than six additional methods there is no error.

### Expected behavior

Quarkus starts without error.

### Actual behavior

An exception is thrown:

```
$ mvn clean quarkus:dev
[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO]
[INFO] ---------------------< org.acme:camel-reproducer >----------------------
[INFO] Building camel-reproducer 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
[INFO] --------------------------------[ jar ]---------------------------------
[INFO]
[INFO] --- maven-clean-plugin:2.5:clean (default-clean) @ camel-reproducer ---
[INFO] Deleting /Users/miguel.pedro/workspace/quarkus-examples/camel-reproducer/target
[INFO]
[INFO] --- quarkus-maven-plugin:2.13.3.Final:dev (default-cli) @ camel-reproducer ---
[INFO] Invoking org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-resources-plugin:2.6:resources @ camel-reproducer
[INFO] Using 'UTF-8' encoding to copy filtered resources.
[INFO] Copying 1 resource
[INFO] Invoking io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.13.3.Final:generate-code @ camel-reproducer
[INFO] Invoking org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-compiler-plugin:3.8.1:compile @ camel-reproducer
[INFO] Changes detected - recompiling the module!
[INFO] Compiling 2 source files to /Users/miguel.pedro/workspace/quarkus-examples/camel-reproducer/target/classes
[INFO] Invoking org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-resources-plugin:2.6:testResources @ camel-reproducer
[INFO] Using 'UTF-8' encoding to copy filtered resources.
[INFO] skip non existing resourceDirectory /Users/miguel.pedro/workspace/quarkus-examples/camel-reproducer/src/test/resources
[INFO] Invoking io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.13.3.Final:generate-code-tests @ camel-reproducer
[INFO] Invoking org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-compiler-plugin:3.8.1:testCompile @ camel-reproducer
[INFO] No sources to compile
Listening for transport dt_socket at address: 5005
2022-10-26 17:11:53,758 INFO  [io.qua.dep.dev.IsolatedDevModeMain] (main) Attempting to start live reload endpoint to recover from previous Quarkus startup failure
2022-10-26 17:11:53,787 ERROR [io.qua.dep.dev.IsolatedDevModeMain] (main) Failed to start quarkus: java.lang.RuntimeException: io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors
	[error]: Build step io.quarkus.arc.deployment.ArcProcessor#generateResources threw an exception: java.lang.IllegalStateException: java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.objectweb.asm.MethodTooLargeException: Method too large: org/acme/MyBuilder_Subclass.<init> (Ljavax/enterprise/context/spi/CreationalContext;Lio/quarkus/arc/InjectableInterceptor;)V
	at io.quarkus.deployment.ExtensionLoader$3.execute(ExtensionLoader.java:918)
	at io.quarkus.builder.BuildContext.run(BuildContext.java:281)
	at org.jboss.threads.ContextHandler$1.runWith(ContextHandler.java:18)
	at org.jboss.threads.EnhancedQueueExecutor$Task.run(EnhancedQueueExecutor.java:2449)
	at org.jboss.threads.EnhancedQueueExecutor$ThreadBody.run(EnhancedQueueExecutor.java:1478)
	at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:829)
	at org.jboss.threads.JBossThread.run(JBossThread.java:501)
Caused by: java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.objectweb.asm.MethodTooLargeException: Method too large: org/acme/MyBuilder_Subclass.<init> (Ljavax/enterprise/context/spi/CreationalContext;Lio/quarkus/arc/InjectableInterceptor;)V
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.report(FutureTask.java:122)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(FutureTask.java:191)
	at io.quarkus.arc.processor.BeanProcessor.generateResources(BeanProcessor.java:322)
	at io.quarkus.arc.deployment.ArcProcessor.generateResources(ArcProcessor.java:565)
	at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)

	at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:566)
	at io.quarkus.deployment.ExtensionLoader$3.execute(ExtensionLoader.java:909)
	... 6 more
Caused by: org.objectweb.asm.MethodTooLargeException: Method too large: org/acme/MyBuilder_Subclass.<init> (Ljavax/enterprise/context/spi/CreationalContext;Lio/quarkus/arc/InjectableInterceptor;)V
	at org.objectweb.asm.MethodWriter.computeMethodInfoSize(MethodWriter.java:2088)
	at org.objectweb.asm.ClassWriter.toByteArray(ClassWriter.java:511)

	at io.quarkus.deployment.dev.IsolatedDevModeMain.accept(IsolatedDevModeMain.java:59)

	[error]: Build step io.quarkus.arc.deployment.ArcProcessor#generateResources threw an exception: java.lang.IllegalStateException: java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.objectweb.asm.MethodTooLargeException: Method too large: org/acme/MyBuilder_Subclass.<init> (Ljavax/enterprise/context/spi/CreationalContext;Lio/quarkus/arc/InjectableInterceptor;)V
	at io.quarkus.deployment.ExtensionLoader$3.execute(ExtensionLoader.java:918)

Caused by: java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.objectweb.asm.MethodTooLargeException: Method too large: org/acme/MyBuilder_Subclass.<init> (Ljavax/enterprise/context/spi/CreationalContext;Lio/quarkus/arc/InjectableInterceptor;)V

	at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:566)
	at io.quarkus.deployment.ExtensionLoader$3.execute(ExtensionLoader.java:909)
	... 6 more
Caused by: org.objectweb.asm.MethodTooLargeException: Method too large: org/acme/MyBuilder_Subclass.<init> (Ljavax/enterprise/context/spi/CreationalContext;Lio/quarkus/arc/InjectableInterceptor;)V
	at org.objectweb.asm.MethodWriter.computeMethodInfoSize(MethodWriter.java:2088)
```

### How to Reproduce?

Reproducer: https://github.com/miguel-figueiredo/quarkus-examples/tree/master/camel-reproducer

Steps to reproduce:

1. Run `./mvnw compile quarkus:dev` 

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin PT-340360-MBP32M1P.lan 21.6.0 Darwin Kernel Version 21.6.0: Mon Aug 22 20:19:52 PDT 2022; root:xnu-8020.140.49~2/RELEASE_ARM64_T6000 arm64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk 11.0.16 2022-07-19 LTS OpenJDK Runtime Environment Corretto-11.0.16.8.1 (build 11.0.16+8-LTS) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Corretto-11.0.16.8.1 (build 11.0.16+8-LTS, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.13.3.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.6 (84538c9988a25aec085021c365c560670ad80f63) Maven home: /opt/homebrew/Cellar/maven/3.8.6/libexec Java version: 11.0.16, vendor: Amazon.com Inc., runtime: /Users/miguel.pedro/.sdkman/candidates/java/11.0.16-amzn Default locale: en_PT, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "mac os x", version: "12.6", arch: "aarch64", family: "mac"

### Additional information

_No response_
